titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SUPPORT STATUS INDICATOR (AT ANTENATAL BOOKING) - Permitted Codes

strow.stentry: Yes - mother reports feeling she is supported in pregnancy and looking after the baby, from partner, family or friends
No - mother reports feeling she is not supported in pregnancy and looking after the baby, from partner, family or friends
